Posts.Content: hi i am a witness of how kangen water affects and changes my life and my family. ive learned about kangen through a friend who suffered spinal problem and he was introduced with the water for 3 months now, hes been bedridden for sometime and was so dedicated to the water that after 3 mos he was able to stand and walk.having witnessed this myself,i got so interested since i also have a lot of health issues but different from his, having constipation and asthma which affects my life all the time,weh i started on taking this water,i never thought i could have a bowel movement everyday since i usually does it 1x or 2x a week,now im beginning to enjoy the wonders of it.i am starting to meet friends who are also into kangen and just like me they are amaze of the results tamarra
